title: [K-12] Development of Civic Education Learning Models Using Controversial Media Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Civic Awareness and Understanding of Social Issues
context.additional_context: Strengthening data analysis and collaborative activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze the context of controversial issues presented in media.

In 4-person group discussions, perform 3-stage collaborative debates (opinion gathering → consensus-building → conclusion presentation) on two social issues (e.g., school rule revisions) and achieve 'excellent' ratings in ≥2 out of 3 peer evaluation rubric criteria (participation, respect, contribution)
Learners can logically present creative solutions to complex social problems.

resources: Digital Resources on Current Social Issues

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
